sentences.en: a vicious attack on a helpless victim
sentences.cn: 对无助受害者的残暴攻击

sentences.en: Carrie was still with him, but not helpless and pleading.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉仍然和他在一起, 但是已经不是懦弱无助哀哀乞怜了.

sentences.en: Children are dying, and I am helpless to do anything.
sentences.cn: 孩子们已奄奄一息，而我却无力做任何事情。

sentences.en: He began to feel depressed and helpless.
He who knows only how to wield a pen usually feels quite helpless in the face of practical problems.
sentences.cn: 光会耍笔杆的人,碰到实际问题往往束手无策.

sentences.en: If the wolf doesn't turn back its head , the eagle is helpless.
sentences.cn: 狼只要不回转身来,他就毫无办法.

sentences.en: If you turn over a turtle on its back, it will become helpless.
sentences.cn: 假如你把海龟翻过来, 它就无能为力了.

sentences.en: Many animals display maternal instincts only while their offspring are young and helpless.
sentences.cn: 许多动物在其幼崽弱小无法自助时都显出了母性的本能.

sentences.en: Newman threw out a hand in a helpless gesture.
sentences.cn: 纽曼伸出手做了个无助的手势。

sentences.en: Often he teased me till my temper went and I stamped and screamed, feeling furiously helpless.
sentences.cn: 他经常和我开玩笑，直到我生气地跺脚尖叫，却又无可奈何。

sentences.en: Once aboard we were soon helpless with laughter at the absurdity of it.
sentences.cn: 一上飞机我们就按捺不住，大笑起这事的荒唐。

sentences.en: Parents often feel helpless, knowing that all the cuddles in the world won't stop the tears.
sentences.cn: 父母经常感到无能为力，因为他们知道无论多少次拥抱也无法止住眼泪。

sentences.en: Perhaps the helpless, ignorant babies only cry by instinct.
sentences.cn: 无助无知的婴儿,哭只是他们的本能.

sentences.en: That he could not hart a child or anything helpless.
sentences.cn: 他不忍心伤害儿童或其他软弱无力的人或动物.

sentences.en: The other team was helpless and we had a real field day.
sentences.cn: 对方队很弱,我们轻易取胜.

sentences.en: They are not merely helpless victims.
sentences.cn: 他们并非无助的受害者。

sentences.en: They felt helpless to do anything about it.
sentences.cn: 他们对这事感到无能为力.
